ComicInfo.Summary:
Unsung Heroes in the History of Humour: False biographical oddities about comedians in their advanced old age.
Professor Brainard Admonishes His Nephew Maynard: Rhyme about the perils of youth
The Space Case: Cautionary rhyme about spreading our bad habits elsewhere.
Professor Brainard Encounters Lemurman: The Professor meets Lemurman.
The Hucksters: The Professor rails against greed.
A Dissertation On Creation: A rhyming rant against creationists.
Peter Makes the Scene: Peter is introduced to other women.
Ricky Dickner's Manic Activity Book: The fate of wildman Ricky Dickner.
The Old Songs are the Best Songs: Humourous adaptations of old song lyrics. The songs adapted are: On the Street Where You Live, My Guy, Purple Haze and When You Go a Courtin'.
Macedonio #268314: Life in a Texas prison
